# radio-button-group

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Description

Renders a radio-button-group

## Properties

| Attribute              | Description                                    | Type                |
| ---------------------- | ---------------------------------------------- | ------------------- |
| `selectedItem`         | Stores the selected radio button               | `object`            |
| `el`                   | Stores the radio button group element          | `object`            |
| `radioButtons`         | Stores the radio buttons                       | `array`             |

## Events

| Event                           | Description                           | Type                |
| ------------------------------- | ------------------------------------- | ------------------- |
| `radioButtonClick`              | Fires when the component changes.     | `CustomEvent<void>` |
